queries.query: SELECT mean("cpu_usage_nanocores")/1000000000 AS "Usage" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND ("host"=:host:) GROUP BY time(:interval:)FILL(null)

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("network_tx_bytes"))/1000000 AS "Sent", non_negative_derivative(mean("network_rx_bytes"))/1000000 AS "Received" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."kubernetes_node" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND ("host"=:host:) GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)
